name: Mika's Directional
alt: X, Y, and Z coordinates and facing direction appear above the Minecraft hotbar
desc: Adds a customizable action bar that includes your coordinates and facing direction!
overview: Mika's Directional is a Minecraft 1.18 plugin that adds a customizable action bar that includes your coordinates and facing direction.
features:
Enabling or disabling the coordinates/facing direction
Changing the color of the labels/values
Optional permissions to customize/reload the configâ€‹

name: Mika's Name Everything
desc: Adds the ability to craft nametags and customize experience usage!
